description: A 100% flame-grilled beef patty topped with veal bacon, cheese, crispy onion, Western BBQ sauce, lettuce and tomato. Served in a corn dusted bun.

description: The Big King XL has two grilled burgers with triple cheese on them, sliced onions, lettuce, pickles and BIG King sauce.

name: extra long chilli cheese
description: Has a layer of three freshly flame-grilled beef patties with soft melted cheddar cheese, fiery chilli cheese sauce and hot jalapeños. In a nutshell: full of taste from start to finish.

name: double chilli cheese
description: Two juicy patties topped off with Chilli Cheese Sauce, jalapeños and spicy mayo. Spicy never tasted this good.

name: double cheeseburger
description: Two signature flame-grilled patties topped with melted cheese, crinkle cut pickles, yellow mustard and ketchup on a toasted sesame seeds bun.

name: big king
description: The BIG KING comes with two freshly flame-grilled 100% pure beef patties, cheese, onions, pickles and the unique BIG KING™ sauce, it just tastes amazing. At four inches in diameter, it is also very substantial.
bundle: * Combo meal comes with large fries and a soda

name: deluxe
description: A 100% flame-grilled beef patty topped with cheese, crispy onion, Western BBQ sauce, lettuce and tomato. Served in a corn dusted bun.

name: double cheese bacon
description: Double Cheeseburger has two signature flame-grilled beef patties topped with melted American cheese, bacon, crinkle cut pickles, yellow mustard, and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun.
bundle: * Combo meal comes with large fries and a soda

name: tendercrisp chicken
description: Our Chicken TENDERCRISP Sandwich is made with a premium chicken breast fillet, generously breaded with homemade seasoning and carefully layered with fresh lettuce, ripe juicy tomatoes, and creamy mayonnaise between a corn dusted bun.
bundle: * Combo meal comes with large fries and a soda

name: long chicken
description: There are some things you can't get enough of - good taste, for example. This is why we only use our extra-long sesame seed buns for your Original Chicken Sandwich, filled with soft chicken breast in a seasoned coating. Mmmm... so much flavour means no one will go short.
bundle: * Combo meal comes with large fries and a soda

name: crispy chicken
description: Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside. The crispy chicken has everything you would expect from an excellent chicken burger: the finest chicken in a seasoned crispy coating, garnished with crunchy lettuce and freshly sliced tomatoes. An unrivalled masterpiece.
bundle: * Combo meal comes with large fries and a soda

name: long chilli cheese chicken
description: Add some spice to an Original Chicken and choose the Chilli Cheese Chicken, smothered in chilli cheese sauce and a generous helping of fiery jalapeños.
bundle: * Combo meal comes with large fries and a soda

name: junior hamburger
description: Our signature flame-grilled beef patty burger served with a small side of piping hot, thick cut fries and a small fountain drink of your choice to make it a meal. And get this, it comes with one free *toy!
bundle: *Available toys

name: junior cheeseburger
description: 100% beef patty topped with a slice of melted cheese, pickles, ketchup and mustard all wrapped up in a sesame seed bun and served with a small side of crunchy crisp French Fries and a small fountain drink of your choice, right next to one really cool *toy!
bundle: *Available toys

name: junior 4 chicken nuggets

description: 4 tender, juicy, crispy pieces of nuggets with a BBQ dip, served with a small side of piping hot fries, a small drink of your choice and one *toy worthy of a KING!

name: king wings
description: Our perfectly spiced chicken wings are great for sharing. Available in a 6-piece, 9-piece or 12-piece pack - for the hungry or super hungry chicken fans.

name: king wings meal
description: Our perfectly spiced chicken wings are great for sharing. Available in a 6-piece, 9-piece or 12-piece pack - for the hungry or super hungry chicken fans.

name: chicken nuggets
description: Made with white meat, our bite-sized Chicken Nuggets are tender and juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside. Coated in a crispy tempura, they are perfect for dipping in any of our delicious sauces.

name: chicken nuggets meal
description: Made with white meat, our bite-sized Chicken Nuggets are tender and juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside. Coated in a crispy tempura, they are perfect for dipping in any of our delicious sauces.

name: chilli cheese bites
description: Crispy coat with smooth and spicy cheese inside. Unique taste of chilli with every bite. You will love our Chilli Cheese Bites!

name: fries
description: More delicious than ever, our signature piping hot, thick cut Salted French Fries are golden on the outside and fluffy on the inside.

name: king onion rings
description: Served hot and crispy, our golden Onion Rings are the perfect treat for plunging into one of our bold or classic sauces.

name: crunchy chicken salad
description: Something light on the tummy but super packed with great nutrients. Come enjoy a bowl of Crunchy Chicken Salad with special sauce!

name: grilled chicken salad
description: Something light on the tummy but super packed with great nutrients. Come enjoy a bowl of Grilled Chicken Salad with special sauce!

name: delight salad
description: Something light on the tummy but super packed with great nutrients. Come enjoy a bowl of Delight Salad with special sauce!

name: king deal
description: none

name: hamburger
description: Try our Hamburger, a signature flame-grilled beef patty topped with a simple layer of crinkle cut pickles, yellow mustard, and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun.

name: cheeseburger
description: Made from 100% beef topped with a slice of melted cheese, pickles, ketchup and mustard all wrapped up in a sesame seed bun. If it aint broke, don't fix it.

name: hing fusion
description: The BK Fusion with Oreo® combines our delicious, smooth vanilla ice cream with crunchy bits of Oreo® cookies. The BK Fusion with KitKat® combines our delicious, smooth vanilla ice cream with crunchy bits of KitKat® chocolate.

name: chocolate donut
description: Our soft and tender Chocolate Donut treats your taste buds to a roller coaster of creamy and chocolatey fun, yum!

name: milkshake
description: There's only one problem, which flavour do you choose? Vanilla? Chocolate? Strawberry? This could take some time.

name: cone
description: We didn’t invent the cone, but with one taste of our cool, creamy, and velvety vanilla Cone, you’ll think we perfected it.

name: sundae
description: Cool and creamy with a flavored swirl, our made-to-order Sundae are complemented by our velvety vanilla soft serve.

name: sodas
description: Quench your thirst with a soft drink.

name: water
description: Keep refreshed with every sip.
